    • Method Detail

      • getApiKey

        public static java.lang.String getApiKey(android.content.Context context)

      • initElementSDK

        public static void initElementSDK(android.content.Context context)
        Used to send your api key to the Element SDK. Call this in Application.onCreate()
        Parameters:
        context - a valid context

      • enrollNewUser

        public static void enrollNewUser(android.app.Activity activity,
                                 @Nullable
                                 java.lang.String userName,
                                 @Nullable
                                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extras)
        Used to enroll a new user via the Element SDK
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity that is making the enroll request
        userName - the name of the user you are enrolling
        extras - a key value map of any additional info you would like to send

      • identifyUser

        public static void identifyUser(android.app.Activity activity,
                                @Nullable
                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> elementUserIds)
        Used to search and identify existing users via the Element SDK
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity that is making the identify request
        elementUserIds - a list of user ids indicating the users you would like to search through. Passing null searches all user ids, passing empty will always yield no results

      • deleteUser

        public static void deleteUser(android.app.Activity activity,
                              @NonNull
                              java.lang.String elementUserId)
        Used to delete a user from the element SDK. Keep in mind that user deletions are synced across devices
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity that is making the delete request
        elementUserId - the element user id corresponding to the user that should be deleted

      • requestSyncState

        public static void requestSyncState(android.content.Context context,
                                    @Nullable
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> elementUserIds,
                                    ElementSDKManager.SyncStateListener listener)
        Used to get the sync state for several user ids
        Parameters:
        context - the activity making the request. Can be a non activity but this method cannot deal with permission denial if not called with an activity first
        elementUserIds - the list of element user ids you are requesting the sync information for. Passing null returns the sync information for all of your app's users. Passing an empty list will not return any sync information
        listener - used to deliver the ElementSyncState information

      • onActivityResult

        public static void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                    int resultCode,
                                    android.content.Intent data,
                                    ElementSDKManager.ElementActivityListener elementActivityListener)
        Call this in Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) to receive results from the Element SDK
        Parameters:
        elementActivityListener - an instance of ElementSDKManager.EnrollListener or ElementSDKManager.SearchListener used to receive results
